title: Naturopathic Medicine San Jose - Naturopathic Family Health
author: Jen Jewell-Larsen
description: Naturopathic Family Health is a naturopathic medicine clinic in San Jose. We apply a holistic approach to health care by combining conventional medical diagnosis with naturopathic therapies.
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medicine Appointments Naturopathic medicine appointments typically include the following: - A thorough discussion of your current symptoms and health history - For in person visits, your vitals (blood pressure, height and weight) and relevant physical exam - Complete annual physical exams and well woman exams, including pap smears as needed - Recommendations for lab evaluation, including conventional blood work as well as functional tests for closer examinations of the digestive system, hormone levels, and environmental toxicity Individualized comprehensive treatment plans, typically including: Nutritional Recommendations - Individualized nutritional guidance for prevention as well as specific medical conditions - Education and resources on how to implement sustainable dietary changes - Clinical nutrition using professional grade supplements for target areas Herbal Medicine - Professional grade plant-based medicines to support target areas Prescription Medicines - When appropriate, our naturopathic doctors are able to prescribe some medications, including thyroid medications and hormone replacement therapy Lifestyle Education - Recommendations to optimize sleep and energy - Stress management tools - Appropriate exercise Our [naturopathic doctor's](https://naturopathicfamilyhealth.com/practitioners/) goal is to work with you to find the most effective natural treatments to help you feel your best, and to support you to incorporate beneficial changes for your health. Let us help you by providing the essential tools for you to feel healthy and well long-term.
